name: Female Alear (Fire Emblem Engage)
description:
Alear is here! Suffering from an acute form of Anime Protagonist Syndrome, Alear will appear in image generation with the help of this LORA. I strongly recommend that you use the built in Lora activation in A1111 web-ui so that you may toggle the "Apply Lora to outputs rather than inputs when possible (experimental)" option in the web-ui's settings. What does it do? I know nothing of the technical details, but it helps apply a character style to an existing prompt much, much easier. Toggle it on and off to test the effects for yourself.

All preview images involved toggling the above experimental feature on an off, img2img from txt2img, and the ultimate SD upscale script. The prompts you see in the images are from the final upscale, and are similar to the initial txt2img. Models used in the generation of the preview images were Anything3 pruned with fixed clip, CorneosShinra26_v1, and abyssorangemix2SFW pruned. No Lora's besides this one was use, nor were any embeddings used.

If you want to put Alear in a more official type outfit you will need to use at least some of the words below. Most are words used in the training of the LORA:

Gloves

Blue Gloves

Skirt

Pleated Skirt

Blue Skirt

Bowtie

White Bowtie

Gold Trim

Cape (be prepared to put this in the negative prompt)

Red Cape (be prepared to put this in the negative prompt)

White Cape (be prepared to put this in the negative prompt)

Braid

Crown Braid

Tiara

Rerebrace (it's those weird black things on her arms...at least I hope so since its the word I used)

Epaulettes

Ribbon

Blue Ribbon

Shoulder pads

Collared Shirt

High Collar

White Shirt

Corset

Blue Corset

Armguard

Gauntlets

Boots

High Heels

High Heel boots

Armored Boots

thighhighs

white thighhighs

black thighhighs

garter straps

Heterochromia

red eyes

blue eyes

two-tone hair

red hair

blue hair

streaked hair

crossed bangs

shiny hair

Pony Tail

High Pony Tail

Very Long Hair (be prepared to put this in the negative prompt)

cowboy shot

from above

from behind (be prepared to toggle the LORA experimental feature I described above if you use this)

game screenshot (negative prompt)

fanart (negative prompt)

official art

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description:
Trained on 65 images with detailed captions (...took...so..much...time..captioning)

Trained at 704 resolution, clip skip 2, no vae. 65 images at 10 repeats for 5 epochs at batch 5- which led to 650 steps. Unet 0.00035, TE 0.00012

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, official art, aged up Alear_F, solo, medium hair, crown braid, jeans, open coat, green coat, heterochromia, waving, outdoors, pink shirt<lora:Alear_F:1>
meta.negativePrompt: lowres, text, error, cropped, (worst quality:1.1), (low quality,:1.1) jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name, (fanart:1.1), green eyes, necklace

meta.prompt: (extremely detailed CG unity 8k wallpaper),(masterpiece), (best quality), (ultra-detailed), (best illustration),(best shadow), official art,A lear_F, white shirt, high collar shirt, shoulder pads, white bowtie, armguards, gauntlets, cape, cowboy shot, high heel boots, crown braid, streaked hair, tiara, epaulettes, impossible clothes, rerebrace, solo, pleated skirt, white thighhighs, garter straps, running towards viewer, (monsters in background:1.2), red eyes, blue eyes, red hair, blue hair, straight hair, long hair, heterochromia<lora:Alear_F:1>
meta.negativePrompt: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, mutated hand, text, error, missing fingers, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, artist name, out of focus, (wedding ring:1.1), 2girls, 3girls, (((multiple views))), (((bad proportions))), (((multiple legs))), (((multiple arms))), (monotone). 3D. low quality lowres multiple breasts, (necktie:1.2), weapons, windy, flowing clothing

meta.prompt: (masterpiece:1.3),official art, 1girl, shirt, pants, best quality, highres, 4k, 8k, ray tracing detailed, intricate, soft lighting, realistic, full_body, heterochromia, red hair, blue hair, streaked hair, (wide hips) (abs:0.8), standing, from behind,looking at viewer. intricate (high detail:1.1) body, skindentation, laser show<lora:Alear_F:1>, wearing clothes

meta.prompt: extremely detailed CG unity 8k wallpaper, official art,Alear_F, thick thighs, boxing ring, pony tail, red hair, blue hair, streaked hair, two-tone hair, red eyes, blue eyes, heterochromia, yellow crop top, crop top, crop top overhang, boxing, boxing shoes, perfectly shaded boxing gloves, collarbone, fighting stance, looking at viewer, serious, crowd<lora:Alear_F:1>
